edu.nyu.cs.connectfour.player.observer

Interface PlayerInfoObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlayerPanel

    public interface PlayerInfoObserver
    Author:
    shenli

    A class can implement the PlayerInfoObserver interface when it wants to be informed of player information changes in PlayerInfoSubject objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void updatePlayerInfo(PlayerInfo playerInfo, String name, Color color)
      This method is called whenever the observed object is changed.

    • Method Detail

      • updatePlayerInfo

        void updatePlayerInfo(PlayerInfo playerInfo,
                      String name,
                      Color color)
        This method is called whenever the observed object is changed. An application calls a PlayerInfoSubject object's notifyGamePlayerInfoObservers method to have all the object's observers notified of the player information change.

        Parameters:
        playerInfo - a PlayerInfo object passed to the notifyPlayerInfoObservers method
        name - a name passed to the notifyPlayerInfoObservers method
        color - a Color object passed to the notifyPlayerInfoObservers method
